```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(vroom)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
source('utils.R')
table_var <- function(df, var, n = 100, max_n = nrow(df)){
  df %>% 
    select(!!enquo(var)) %>% 
    slice(1:max_n) %>% 
    table() %>% 
    sort(decreasing = T) %>%
    head(n)
}
```
